title: Ghost in the Machine by Ed James (Retail - Request) {Rose88}
description:
Title: Ghost in the Machine (Scott Cullen Mysteries #1)
Author: Ed James
Published: Apr 2012
Publisher: Ed James
Format: Epub (Retail)
Language: English
Genres: Fiction, Mystery, Thriller

(*Request*)


The first book in a series of Edinburgh-based police procedurals starring DC Scott Cullen, which feature social media at its dark heart and has been compared favourably with Ian Rankin, Mark Billingham and Stuart MacBride.

Detective Constable Scott Cullen of Lothian and Borders has only been three months in CID as a full DC. He is assigned a Missing Persons case which has stretched his uniform colleagues. Caroline Adamson - a young, recently divorced mother from Edinburgh - has disappeared whilst on a date.

The more Cullen digs into her disappearance, the more he unravels her private life. Who was she on a date with? What happened during her divorce from Rob Thomson? As Cullens own private life gets messier and the relationship with his DI deteriorates, Carolines body turns up and he finds himself hunting for a ghost in the machine.
